thread.title: Ending 2023, Newco Capital Group will continue to grow
thread.title_full: Ending 2023, Newco Capital Group will continue to grow

author: Sylvia Quarles
title: Ending 2023, Newco Capital Group will continue to grow
text:
NEW YORK, Dec. 29, 2023 /PRNewswire/ — As we head into 2024, Newco Capital Group (“Newco”), a leading working capital provider in the alternative financing sector, is celebrating a year marked by rapid growth and strong success.
Newco Capital Group
Newco, along with its subsidiary, capital.comhas deployed record-breaking capital to small businesses (SMBs) and enterprise companies in 2023 and maintains its position as the leading trusted brand in merchant cash advances.
In form of merchant cash advance The market is expanding, with US small business owners using alternative financial instruments expected to grow to $20.39 billion in 2024. This growth has been attributed to the multifaceted shift in traditional lending practices as well as the evolving dynamics of post-Covid SMBs. landscape.
With a commitment to understanding the needs of small businesses and a serious approach to reducing friction for small business owners seeking working capital, Newco is dedicated to bridging the gap with sustainable financing while ensuring that SMBs can grow, scale and create jobs.
CEO of Newco, albert gahfee, has further doubled down on growth and invested more in the technology, personnel and products that drive NewCo's growth, in keeping with the company's mission of sustainable working capital for small business. Albert expressed this strategy this way: “Newco was founded with the dual purpose of offering a reliable funding source for small business entrepreneurs and enhancing growth and development opportunities for our team and partners. This dedication has solidified our role as the leading solution for interested companies.” Financing. We take great pride in our core values and our strong adherence to nutrition corporate culture We have done farming. Newco is committed to offering exceptional products and services, striving to maintain and improve its position as a leading provider in the merchant cash advance industry.”
The company's reputation for efficient processes and fast turnaround times is well known to the ISO and broker networks, and the company has achieved the premier status of being a “preferred funder” within the alternative financing market. bruce gurwitschChief Revenue Officer of NewCo and Capital.com said: “At NewCo, our remarkable growth is a direct result of our dedicated team, innovative offerings and. clear strategic vision, Over the past year, we have set new standards in providing capital to a wide variety of businesses while boosting the broader economy. With a solid financial foundation and a unique perspective “Given market dynamics, we remain bullish and optimistic about our trajectory for 2024.”
About Newco Capital Group, LLC
Newco Capital Group is an alternative finance company specializing in MCA bridge-capital. As a preferred provider, the company is focused on promoting growth within the small and medium-sized business ecosystem. We're excited to provide faster and easier access to capital to help small businesses grow, scale, and create jobs. Our technology, proprietary methods and extensive experience set us apart, allowing us to maintain our competitive edge and continue to deliver value to our merchants and employees alike. For more information, visit www.NewCoCapitalGroup.com and www.capytal.com.
